entity

Class Rat

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Entity
      • entity.Rat
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicRat, DeathRat

    public abstract class Rat
extends Entity
    Types of directions rats can move in. North, Eat, South, West

      • forceMove

        public boolean forceMove(int movesLeft,
                         Direction direction)
        Used by other entities to move rats in a different way.

        side-effects

        not referentially transparent

        Parameters:
        movesLeft - takes how many moves are needed for moving
        direction - takes direction to move in
